text: The canton of Gérardmer is an administrative division of the Vosges department, in northeastern France. At the French canton reorganisation which came into effect in March 2015, it was expanded from 3 to 17 communes (2 of which merged into the new commune Granges-Aumontzey). Its seat is in Gérardmer.Décret n° 2014-268 du 27 février 2014 portant délimitation des cantons dans le département des Vosges It consists of the following communes: #Anould #Arrentès-de-Corcieux #Ban-sur-Meurthe-Clefcy #Barbey-Seroux #La Chapelle-devant-Bruyères #Corcieux #Fraize #Gérardmer #Gerbépal #Granges- Aumontzey #La Houssière #Liézey #Plainfaing #Le Valtin #Vienville #Xonrupt- Longemer ==References== Category:Cantons of Vosges (department)
title: Canton of Gérardmer
